name: Bimsness Rush
description:
Chaotic first person run and gun (and break and fun) game about the evergrowing stress of the bimsness life. Defeat all enemies and reach the exit as fast as you can!

  • Keyboard & mouse (gamepad might work i think?)
  • Might need a non-potato device because of physics chaos
  • Very short game (~1 minute per attempt)
  • Reaching a high score and finding the optimal route is encouraged

The profit pressure psychosis pushes every person's limits in the hyper competitive struggle for success in the bimsness world. Dash and smash through the billionightmare and pocket pretty pennies from the rival suits in hot pursuit. Keep yourself from ruin by using office props to defend yourself and rush to the end before your savings burn out.

In here, Its pay or be payed.

This project was a submission for the Juice Jam 2 (2023) game jam made by starbi and Gawidev! (this was our first ever game jam, please note that the resulting game appropriately represents our level of sanity by the end of the allocated time)

Credits:

  • OpenKCC (Kinematic Character Controller)
  • Some sounds taken from ZapSplat
  • Contains some meme sounds we did not make ourselves
